name: Pong (itch) (RickyDiculous)
description: First off, sorry for not making anything in a while, just been pretty busy. So, here's a simple pong game! *mild fanfare* This pong game includes single player and up to two people can play locally (pretty edgy!!). Anyway, just having some trouble staying motivated, but still working! Okay, yeah, so... um, well... okay then.
